ing: 1 (1 ounce) envelope instant hot cocoa mix (such as Swiss MissÂ®)
des: "I love to make this to drink on Christmas day at the fireplace with the classic music playing."
ins: Heat milk in a saucepan over high heat; whisk hot cocoa mix into milk until completely dissolved. Continue whisking for 1 minute, reduce heat to medium, and gradually stir in orange juice. Sprinkle cinnamon over the top and stir. Pour hot chocolate into a mug.
